article_title: Loretta Sanchez seen as unscripted alternative for U.S. Senate
article_text: Rep. Loretta Sanchez of Santa Ana is sounding more like a Senate candidate. She’s been critical of fellow Democrat Kamala Harris, who is already in the race. Those who know Sanchez say she’s more formidable than she might appear.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Loretta Sanchez, Kamala Harris, Xavier Becerra, Rocky Chavez, California, Senate, Barbara Boxer

Those who know Sanchez say she’s more formidable than she might appear.
